name: Secret Of The Royal Throne
description: Hidden object adventure set in mystical India discovering the ancient secrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Not terrible, but it's very jumpy. The graphics are nice, but it Runs like older games. There is a pause between areas to load the new rooms, which can be annoying. Not smooth at all. The hints are in a band at the top and not the light flashes like other hidden object games. There are better games out there. I wouldn't recommend this game.
